page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content: Our area is a very rural one which is bordered by the towns of{Bournemouth and{Christchurch}to the South and by the New Forest to the East. Most of the land in our area belongs to one of two people, either{Lord Malmesbury}or {Lord Manners}both of whom run thier estates from outside the area itself. {Lord Malmesbury's }country house still exists and can be found on the very Southern edge of our area, it is currently being used as a private boys boarding school and retains the original name of{Hurn Court. Two small villages are contained within the area,{Hurn}and{Sopley}but the vast majority of land is used for {forestry}or{farming.}The{River Avon} provides some good{fishing}and the {Ramsdown Plantation}is a good walking area.
